title: Simple Coffee Drink
ingredients: 2 (1 gram) packets granular sucrolose sweetener (such as Splenda®)
directions: Mix milk, coffee, and sweetener together in a glass until sweetener is dissolved.

title: Sugar-Free Cardamom-Mango Smoothie
ingredients: 2 ripe mangoes, peeled, pitted, and diced
1/2 cup granular sucrolose sweetener (such as Splenda®), or to taste
directions: Place mango, yogurt, ice, and milk into a blender. Sprinkle in cardamom and sweetener to taste. Puree until smooth, frothy, and creamy.

title: Mock Oatmeal
ingredients: 1 tablespoon granular sucrolose sweetener (such as Splenda®)
directions: In a cereal bowl, stir together the ricotta cheese, sweetener and vanilla. Cover with plastic wrap, and poke a hole to vent steam. Heat in the microwave oven for 2 to 3 minutes, until hot. Remove plastic wrap, stir and enjoy.

title: Light Caramel Frappe
ingredients: 3 (1 gram) packets granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®), or to taste
1 tablespoon fat-free frozen whipped topping, thawed (optional)
directions: Combine ice, milk, coffee, 2 tablespoons caramel topping, vanilla extract, and sucralose sweetener in a blender. Pulse until ice is crushed to a smooth and thick consistency. Pour into a mug or tall glass; decorate with whipped topping. Drizzle 1 tablespoon caramel syrup on top.

title: White Chocolate Coffee
ingredients: 1/3 cup chocolate-covered toffee bits, or more to taste
directions: Butter a baking sheet and line the baking sheet with waxed paper.

Melt white chocolate in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching. Stir in toffee bits, chocolate-covered toffee bits, and coffee. Remove from heat and spread into prepared baking dish. Refrigerate until hardened, about 1 hour; break into pieces.

title: Sugar-Free Hot Chocolate Mix
directions: Combine milk powder, creamer, cocoa powder, sweetener, and cinnamon in a bowl; mix until thoroughly blended. Transfer to a jar with a tight lid.

title: Hot Nutty Irish Coffee
ingredients: 1/2 tablespoon white sugar, or as needed
1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or as needed
1 fluid ounce Irish cream liqueur (such as Baileys®)
1 fluid ounce hazelnut liqueur (such as Frangelico®)
3/4 cup brewed coffee, or more to taste
1 tablespoon whipped cream, or to taste
directions: Mix sugar and cinnamon together on a flat dish. Wet the rim of a mug and dunk into the cinnamon-sugar mixture. Pour Irish cream and hazelnut liqueur into the mug. Add coffee. Top coffee with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon sugar.

title: Coffee and Cream Cocktail
directions: Fill a small glass with ice cubes; pour in coffee-flavored liqueur and Irish cream liqueur. Stir well.

title: Cold Brew Iced Coffee Concentrate
directions: Place 1 1/2 cups of ground coffee into a 64oz glass container (with lid)
Fill the container with water.  Make sure all of the grounds are wet and fill to 64oz mark.
Place lid tightly on the container and shake several times.
Place the container in a dry dark location and wait three days.
Place a funnel into an empty storage container that can hold at least 48oz.  Next place a coffee filter on top of the funnel.
Slowly pour the coffee concentrate through the filter, filling the empty storage container.
You will now have approximately 48oz of cold brew iced coffee concentrate that can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
Making a glass of iced coffee use 4oz of cold brew iced coffee concentrate.
Add 4oz of water.
Add cream, sugar, or syrups. (optional)

title: Low carb coffee frappe
ingredients: 1 cup of cold brewed coffee. (strength is up to you but the stronger the better)
3-4 large scoops of sugar-free vanilla (or chocolate) icecream.
directions: blend all of the ingrediants in a blender until combined and smooth. Enjoy!

title: Iced Coffee Syrup
directions: Combine the instant coffee granules with the hot water and stir until dissolved. Stir in the condensed milk. Store in an airtight container or jar and refrigerate, until ready to use.

title: Quick Start Breakfast Drink
directions: In a blender combine pineapple juice, bananas yogurt, strawberries, wheat germ and vanilla extract. Blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
directions: Combine the yogurt, bananas, strawberries, wheat germ, and honey in a blender; blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

title: Strawberry-Pineapple Smoothie
directions: Pour the apple juice and pineapple into a blender; add the yogurt, pineapple chunks, and frozen strawberries and blend until smooth.

title: Summer Berry Parfait with Yogurt and Granola
directions: Layer 1/4 cup strawberries, 1/4 cup blueberries, 1/3 container yogurt, 1/3 tablespoon wheat germ, 1/3 of the sliced banana, and about 2 tablespoons of granola in a large bowl. Continue to build the parfait, repeating the layers until all of the ingredients are used completely.

title: Gordon's Berry Breakfast Drink
directions: Place the orange juice, pineapple juice,  yogurt, blueberries, strawberries, and bananas into a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. The berry drink will be very thick. Serve immediately.

title: Creamy Strawberry-Pineapple Smoothie
directions: Blend pineapple juice, yogurt, strawberries, and banana together in a blender until smooth.

title: Strawberry Colada Smoothie
directions: Blend coconut water, peaches, kiwis, banana, strawberries, honey, ground ginger, and wheat germ together in a blender on medium speed until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute.

title: Big Daddy's Mila Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
directions: In a blender, combine Mila, milk, oats, banana and strawberries. Add vanilla and sugar if desired. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Strawberry Blueberry Smoothies
directions: Blend almond milk, strawberries, blueberries, yogurt, flax seed oil, and agave nectar in a blender until smooth.

title: Strawberry Banana Protein Shake
directions: Layer milk, protein powder, ice, strawberries, banana, and peanut butter in a blender in this order; blend until creamy and smooth.

title: Big Daddy's Strawberry Chia Breakfast Smoothie
directions: In a blender, combine almond milk, Mila, banana and strawberries. Add vanilla and sugar if desired. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Dreamy Nighttime Drink
directions: Pour milk into a microwave safe mug and place into microwave. Cook on High until the milk is very hot and begins to foam, about 3 minutes. Stir in honey and vanilla, then sprinkle with cinnamon before serving.

title: Milky Tea
directions: In a ceramic or glass mug, combine the milk, honey and vanilla. Microwave on HIGH for about 1 1/2 minutes. Stir.

title: Hot Vanilla
directions: Pour the milk into a microwave-safe mug. Stir together the cinnamon and sugar, then stir into the milk. Mixing the cinnamon into the sugar first will help to keep it from floating on top. Stir in the vanilla. Place mug in the microwave and heat for 1 minute and 40 seconds, or longer for a warmer drink. Stir before drinking.

title: Delicious Healthy Strawberry Shake
directions: In a blender, combine milk, honey, vanilla and frozen strawberries. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Hot Carob
directions: Combine milk and carob powder in a small saucepan over medium heat, whisking to remove any lumps. Stir in honey and vanilla extract. Continue heating to desired temperature.

title: Crazy Cinnamon Milkshake
directions: Combine milk, sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and ice in a blender; blend on high until smooth. Pour milkshake into a glass.

title: Honey Milk Tea--Hongkong Style
directions: Put the tea bags into a glass of hot water, steam the tea until the color turns dark red, discard the tea bags, and let the tea cool.

Put 5 to 6 pieces of ice into a glass/cup, put in the condensed milk and honey, then pour in the tea. Mix it well.(The ice may melt if the tea is still warm, so you can add a couple more pieces of ice.
Then a strong flavorful milk tea is ready for you to enjoy.

title: Bing Cherry Daiquiri
ingredients: 1 1/2 fluid ounces bing cherry infused Cruzan Light Rum
directions: Shake all ingredients until well chilled, strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with a lime wheel.

title: Beet Surprise Cake
directions: Grease one 9x13 inch pan. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Sprinkle lemon juice over beets, set aside.

Combine flour, 1 teaspoon salt, soda, white sugar, cocoa, melted butter, eggs, honey, milk, and 2 teaspoons vanilla in a large mixing bowl. Stir in beets. Beat 2 minutes at medium speed of mixer. Pour into prepared pan.

Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) about 40 minutes. Cool and frost.', "To make frosting: combine cream and cream cheese, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and pinch of salt. Add confectioners' sugar, beat until fluffy. Spread on cake. Add nuts if desired.

title: Lean and Green
directions: Blend spinach, banana, apple, strawberries, mango, milk, protein powder, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Pie Milkshake
ingredients: pinch of pumpkin pie spice + more for garnish
directions: Put entire 1/4 slice of pie into blender.
In the following order, add ice cream, bourbon, pumpkin pie spice and milk.
Blend until combined.
Pour into two tall milkshake glasses.
Top with whipped cream and garnish with a sprinkle of pumpkin pie spice, a straw and a small sliver of pumpkin pie.

title: Apple Pie in a Jar Drink
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups white sugar, or to taste
1 (1 liter) bottle 190 proof grain alcohol (such as Everclear™)
directions: Place the apple cider, apple juice, cinnamon sticks, and sugar into a large pot. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring until the sugar has dissolved. Remove from the heat, and discard the cinnamon sticks. Allow the mixture to cool to room temperature, then stir in the grain alcohol. Pour into quart-size canning jars, seal with the lids and rings, and refrigerate until ready to serve.

title: Apple Pie Cider
directions: In a large pot, combine apple juice, apple cider, sugar and cinnamon sticks. Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let cool completely.
When juice mixture is cool, stir in the grain alcohol.

title: Apple Pie Mixed Drinks
ingredients: 1 (1 liter) bottle 190 proof grain alcohol (such as Everclear®)
directions: Bring apple cider, apple juice, and sugar to a boil in a large pot over medium heat until sugar is dissolved, about 10 minutes. Divide juice mixture evenly into the bottles. Add a cinnamon stick to each bottle.
Divide alcohol into the bottles and allow mixture to cool; seal and store in a cool dry place.

title: Apple Pie Liquor
ingredients: 6 (6 ounce) cans frozen apple juice concentrate, thawed
1 (750 milliliter) bottle 190 proof grain alcohol (such as Everclear®)
directions: Mix water, apple cider, apple juice concentrate, white sugar, brown sugar, and cinnamon sticks together in a large saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until mixture is reduced, about 45 minutes. Remove from heat and cool for 15 minutes. Stir grain alcohol into mixture until evenly combined. Cool 'apple pie liquor' completely. Pour apple pie liquor and 1 cinnamon stick into a jar or container.

title: Apple Pie Moonshine
ingredients: 3/4 cup Shiraz or other dry red wine
directions: Combine the pomegranate juice, wine, and lemon juice in a bowl. Whisk in the cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves and ginger. Crumble in half of the brown sugar and whisk mixture until sugar dissolves.

Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat and swirl to coat the pan. Immediately pour in the juice/spice mixture and increase the heat to high. Bring mixture to a boil while whisking to prevent scorching. Reduce heat to medium and, while stirring, add the remaining brown sugar a little at a time. Cook and stir until mixture thickens to a syrupy consistency or when it can coat the back of a spoon.
Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly and continue to cool, 5 to 10 minutes. Stir and serve.

title: Easy Applesauce
directions: Peel and cut apples into chunks.

Mix in brown sugar, cinnamon, lemon juice, a dash of salt and the apple cider. Bring to a boil and then reduce to simmer for approximately 20 minutes. Uses a potato masher while cooking to help breakdown the softened apples. Serve warm or cool.

title: Caramel Apple Cider with Salty-Sweet Rim
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine vegetable broth, soy sauce, lemon juice, oregano, thyme, 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic, Himalayan salt, and dash of pepper in a large bowl.
Bring a saucepan of water to a boil. Cut tempeh in half and add to the boiling water. Boil for 10 minutes to remove any bitter taste. Transfer tempeh to a cutting board and allow to cool slightly.

Cut tempeh into 1/4-inch slices and place them in the vegetable broth marinade. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator 8 hours to overnight, stirring occasionally to be sure tempeh is covered with marinade.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Transfer marinated tempeh slices to the prepared baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven, turning halfway through, until golden brown and beginning to crisp at the edges, 30 to 35 minutes.
Place pitas in the hot oven until warmed through, 3 to 5 minutes.

Squeeze excess water from cucumbers using a paper towel. Place tofu, cucumbers, dill, 1 teaspoon garlic, salt, and pepper in a food processor. Blend until tzatziki is well mixed. Adjust seasonings if desired.
Assemble a gyro by placing 1/4 of tempeh slices, tomatoes, and red onions on top of a pita. Cover with tzatziki. Repeat with remaining tempeh, tomatoes, onion, and pita.

title: Rhonda's Apple Cider Sangria
ingredients: Grapes that have been pulled off the stems, washed and frozen. To be used in place of ice cubes!
directions: Place sliced fruit in a 2-qt pitcher. Pour all the liquids into the pitcher with the fruit and stir.
When serving put a handful of frozen grapes in the bottom of the glass. Pour the sangria over the grapes.
Garnish each drink with some of the sliced fruit!

title: Hot Cinnamon Apple Brandy Cider
directions: Combine apple cider, apple brandy, 1/4 cup plus 1 tablespoon brown sugar, honey, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, cloves, pepper, and salt in a pot over medium-high heat. Simmer until flavors combine, about 10 minutes.
Pour apple cider mixture into heat-proof mugs. Twist orange zest strips between your fingers to release the essential oils; drop 1 into each mug. Add 1 cinnamon stick to each mug.

title: Red Apple Martini
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger sour apple schnapps
directions: Fill a drink shaker with ice, and pour in the sour apple schnapps, whiskey, and cranberry juice. Shake well, then strain into a martini glass.

title: Sparkling Apple Cider Drink
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Oil a 12x15 inch pan with olive oil.

Place salt pork in a large, deep skillet over medium heat. Cook until evenly brown, stirring occasionally. Stir in 1 chopped onion, and continue cooking until onion is tender and lightly browned; set aside.

Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine potatoes and remaining chopped onions. Fill the bowl of a food processor with the mixture, and 1 egg. Process until smooth, then transfer to a large bowl. Repeat until all has been processed. Season with pepper. Stir in the salt pork mixture. Blend in flour gradually to absorb some moisture, but err on the side of less flour.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and continue baking for 1 hour, or until top is evenly browned.

title: Tanning Bed Drink
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coconut flavored rum
directions: In a rocks glass, pour coconut rum over ice. Pour pineapple juice to top. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

title: Pink Crush
ingredients: 16 fluid ounces strawberry-flavored soda (such as Crush® Strawberry)
directions: Pour the rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail mixing cup, and stir to combine. Gently pour the strawberry soda into the mixture, pouring down the side of the mixing cup to prevent the soda from going flat. Slowly tilt the mixing cup back and forth a few times to mix; pour into cocktail glasses.

title: Pina Colada IV
directions: In a blender, combine ice, pineapple juice, rum, coconut cream and heavy cream. Blend until smooth. Pour into glass and garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

title: Malibu Bay Breeze
ingredients: 2 fresh pineapples - peeled, cored, and cut into 6 spears
directions: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.
Heat 6 tablespoons butter, white sugar, and nutmeg in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring until sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes. Brush pineapple spears with butter mixture.
Arrange pineapple on preheated grill and cover; grill until lightly browned, turning occasionally, 7 to 10 minutes. Transfer pineapple to a platter.

Melt remaining 1/2 cup butter in another saucepan over medium heat. Stir in brown sugar and heavy cream. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and add vanilla extract and salt. Serve pineapple topped with cream sauce and ice cream.

title: Diva Colada
directions: In a blender combine pineapple juice, pineapple sherbet and coconut cream. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve garnished with a wedge of pineapple and a cherry.

title: Blue Hawaiian Cocktail
directions: Combine rum, blue Curacao, pineapple juice, cream of coconut, and 1 cup crushed ice in blender. Puree on high speed until smooth. Pour into chilled highball glass.
Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a maraschino cherry.

title: Brass Monkey
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coconut flavored rum
directions: In a cocktail mixer full of ice, combine coconut rum and pineapple juice. Shake vigorously and strain into glass. Float 151 rum over the top. Drink in one gulp.

title: Twisted Stripper
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
directions: Combine the whisky, tequila, 151 proof rum, vodka, raspberry liqueur, coconut rum, triple sec, sweet and sour mix, lemon-lime soda, pineapple juice and ice in a cocktail shaker; shake. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with dash of grenadine syrup.

title: Bikini-Tini
directions: Pour into shaker with ice.
Shake until mixed well
garnish with a cherry and enjoy!

title: Sedation
directions: Dissolve yeast in 1/4 cup beer in a small bowl. Let stand until bubbly, about 5 minutes. Mix in remaining beer.

Mix yeast mixture, 2 cups all-purpose flour, bread flour, sourdough starter, and salt in a large plastic container with a lid with a wooden spoon until well combined. Cover and let rise in a warm, draft-free place until doubled in volume, 2 to 4 hours, depending on the power of your starter.
Dust a cutting board with 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour. Turn the dough out onto the board and knead with floured hands for 30 seconds. Shape into a ball.
Line a small bowl with a piece of parchment paper larger than the bowl. Place dough in the bowl and cover with a clean dish towel; let rise until nearly doubled in volume, about 1 1/2 hours.
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) after dough has been rising for 45 minutes. Place a lidded Dutch oven inside after 25 minutes and heat for 20 minutes.

Remove hot Dutch oven from the oven using oven mitts. Place dough carefully inside, lifting it up with the parchment paper. Cut any parchment paper that is peeking out of the Dutch oven with kitchen shears. Cut a cross into the top of the bread using a sharp knife and dust with remaining 1 teaspoon flour. Cover with the hot lid.

Bake bread in the preheated oven for 30 minutes. Remove the lid and continue baking until top is golden brown, about 10 minutes. Lift bread out of the Dutch oven with the parchment paper using oven mitts and tap the bottom; if it sounds hollow, bread is done. Let cool for at least 1 hour on a wire rack.

title: Strawberry Colada
ingredients: 2 1/2 ounces Stirrings Strawberry Daiquiri Cocktail Mixer
2 ounces Stirrings Pina Colada Cocktail Mixer
2 1/2 ounces Captain Morgan Parrot Bay Coconut Rum
directions: Add ingredients to a blender and mix for 15 to 20 seconds or until smooth.
Pour into daiquiri glass.
Garnish with a slice of strawberry and pineapple.
